name: Chakram Chaos
description:
Chakram Chaos!

Controls

Movement    -    Abilities

 up - W      Melee Attack - LMB

 down - S   Ranged Attack - RMB

 right - D    Aoe Attack - E

 left - A

Gameplay

Some important information is that there are three enemies, Melee enemy which has the fastest speed and will attack if it gets too close.  Ranged enemy which doesn't have any attack and just kind of stares at you for now. And lastly a big Melee enemy that has a long melee attack, takes two hits to kill, and is immune to ranged attacks.

Game is only 23MB so if you're wondering if your PC can run it: it can.

Credits
Programmer - Nick
Artist - Austen
Audio Designer - Liam
